name: Reason refill Sound Fx
description: 21 NN-XT patches with all the fx you ever gonna need. The patches are divided as Animal, Crowds, Death and Horror, Everyday Noise, Human, Mechanical, Nature Calling, War and Disaster. Over 2.5Gb compressed into a little over 1Gb refill. Is important to understand that no synthesized sounds have been used to compile this refill.  We have collected those sounds trough the years. All the wave files are in mono recorded at 16 bit 44.100Hz. You are not going to find another collection like this at this price, guaranteed!!!

name: Reason refill Korg MicroKorg
description:
Micro Korg - Huge Potential

 354 wave files recorded in mono at 16 bit 44.100Hz, 140Mb compressed into 70Mb, although it looks small it has great potential, 15 combinator patches, 63 NN-XT patches. The patches are devided in to 7 folders, bass, keyboard, lead, pad, strings, percussion and fx. It could be a powerfull tool in the right hands.

name: Reason refill Yamaha CS-80
description:
460 wave files, 66 NN-XT patches, bass, fx, keyboards, lead, pad, seq, synth and wind and 20 combinator patches, 25 RV7000 Patches, 39 Scream4 Patches and 3 Comb Fx Patches. Over 380 Mb of sounds compressed into 190 Mb refill, all the wave files are recorded at 16 bit, 44.100Hz, some in stereo and some in mono to try to capture as much details as possible in every single wave files.

I can supply  this refill as a soundfont also: 

71 patches,Over 300 Mb of wave files all the wave files are recorded at 16 bit, 44.100Hz, some in stereo and some in mono to try to capture as much details as possible in every single wave files.

Please specify which format you prefer by sending a message after you buy the file...

name: Reason refill Access Virus Vol 1.0
description: 930 Wave Files, 184  NN-XT Patches: 37 Bass Patches, 24 lead Patches, 8 Organ Patches, 24 Pad Patches, 16 Strings Patches,  28 FX Patches, 6 Wave Patches, 41 various Patches, 1 redrum patch, 73 Rex Files, 39 Scream 4 patches and 25 RV7000 patches FX.
